channel.title: Role_types on Rage for ANUSA
channel.description: Recent content in Role_types on Rage for ANUSA

item.title: ANU Council
item.description: ANU Council representatives ensure student interests are represented at the highest level of university governance.

item.title: College Representative
item.description: College Representatives advocate for students in their respective colleges, focusing on academic issues and representing students on key committees.

item.title: Executive
item.description: The Executive team is responsible for the overall direction and leadership of ANUSA. They set priorities, coordinate campaigns, and represent students at the highest level.

item.title: General Representative
item.description: General Representatives work to ensure your voice is heard on campus, supporting ticket-wide initiatives and advocating for student needs.

item.title: NUS Delegate
item.description: NUS Delegates represent ANU students at the National Union of Students, coordinating national campaigns and lobbying for student rights.

item.title: Academic Representative
item.description: Academic Representatives focus on improving the academic experience for all students, working with faculties to ensure fair assessment and strong support.
